name: Major League Baseball 2K12
overview: The longest running Major League Baseball franchise returns to the virtual diamond with MLB 2K12 from 2K Sports. Featuring simple & intuitive controls and immersive game modes for any level of fan, MLB 2K12 is the only game you'll need this season. Total Control Pitching & Hitting – Control the action on the field with simple, intuitive controls. Perfect for gaming on the go. Season and Postseason Modes – Run through the gauntlet of a 162-game season, or skip ahead to the excitement of October baseball. Baseball Cards – Collect over 250 unlockable player cards.
